data.text: It’s plane and simple––our employees are the best around. 💙 #SeeWhatWeDidThere https://t.co/XZ5ZqVR5J1

Happy Fourth! 🇺🇸 We know we can’t truly celebrate freedom until we are all truly free. To those who have fought—and continue to fight for equality—we’re with you every mile of the way. https://t.co/t5ZLXsduRr

Next-Level Care Fact Check! ✅  Cleanliness has always been a top priority, but the next level involves techniques and processes that reduce the already low risk of onboard transmission and exceed CDC guidelines. https://t.co/iDjLNBPowN https://t.co/yxYxkqeSCi

data.text: We love going above and beyond for our communities. ✈️  💙 https://t.co/pXoPXkC78C

Tray tables: up
Seat belts: fastened
Bags: stowed
Phones: off
Masks: on
Let's: go!

Safety is our top priority! Starting in early July, our flight attendants will be empowered to issue a warning to any guest who flagrantly refuses to wear a mask on board our aircraft. Learn more on our blog: https://t.co/MP0HHgSHPQ
From our crew to you! ✈️💙 https://t.co/MAiUc9oqoS

Next-Level Care Fact Check! ✅  Our aircraft are equipped with systems that contain two HEPA filters––the same kind found in hospital operating rooms. If you want more filtered air, simply open the vent above you. (Talk about fresh air!) https://t.co/iDjLNBPowN https://t.co/RDBC5YRSP0

Next-Level Care Fact Check! ✅  To make sure our guests feel safe from check in to check out, we routinely clean airport surfaces like counters, kiosks and desks. Learn more: https://t.co/iDjLNBPowN https://t.co/cLhz79F7vd

data.text: With summer here, we know wanderlust is in the air. What destinations are on your wander-list for when it’s time to travel again? https://t.co/nnhJjZAjcw

Win a chance for you and 3 friends (that’s 4 roundtrip tickets total!) to fly to a Pride festival of your choice next year. To enter for a chance to win 1) tag a friend in the comments below & 2) tell us where you want to go. Contest closes at 11:59 p.m. pst tonight. T&Cs in bio. https://t.co/q1LuqNBure
When we say our Pride flies nonstop, we mean it! 🌈 https://t.co/7Hkffszvq6

Come along for the pride! ✈️ 🌈 Pride might be different this year, but that won't stop us from partaking in the largest, loudest and proudest celebrations. #FlyWithPride Learn more about how to celebrate at home on our blog: https://t.co/BCiB1h6ozG https://t.co/wbyoGBUELo

data.text: From airport check-in to boarding, from takeoff to landing, Next-Level Care involves company-developed COVID-19 procedures in conjunction with the FAA and CDC.

entity.name: Father's Day

data.text: Happy Father’s Day to dads who always go above & beyond! ❤️ This past winter, Alaska pilot Ryan M. was able to fly his son to Hawai'i for the first time as part of a special @MakeAWish trip. Check out our blog to see more of their sweet journey. https://t.co/6bvzp4TjKh
A sunset and a seat with a view? That’s a win-win(dow) situation! https://t.co/hSluDAkNcc

Next-Level Care Fact Check! ✅ While making connections with places and people is kind of our thing, we’ve reduced the ways in which guests and employees connect in person for your safety. https://t.co/iDjLNBPowN https://t.co/ar3Ym7QtOf

“Our hope is that revisiting the struggles and resilience from the past will help increase understanding and help us gather strength for the road ahead.” - Sarah, Air Group Black Employees Allies & Advocates (ABEA) Business Resource Group Leader https://t.co/xJGLvuysq0 https://t.co/0gyzck7TIa
We couldn’t fly as high as we do without each and every single one of our crew! 💙 https://t.co/JOYy0FCfpv
Next-Level Care Fact Check! ✅ Our hospital-grade HEPA filters remove 99.9% of airborne particles (including viruses) on board. https://t.co/iDjLNBPowN https://t.co/IFTndFA9kJ

Next-Level Care Fact #1: We're committed to providing a higher standard of safety throughout your journey. https://t.co/iDjLNC6Zol https://t.co/ntZXX905Gf
LOVE with flying colors. 🌈 Happy Pride month! Join us in a virtual celebration—including downloading our colorful custom phone & video backgrounds. #FlyWithPride https://t.co/J3o1QCHldU
Our pride flies nonstop. 🌈 In honor of Pride month, we brightened up the sky with our special flag ceremony at headquarters. #FlyWithPride #iAmAlaska https://t.co/E3F1N83jTN

We stand for helping one another and we stand for being good to one another. Being kind-hearted and doing the right thing are our values. #BlackLivesMatter https://t.co/RbHH9HZEO2 https://t.co/ZU1GDLWLOK

“Tonga is known for being the friendliest island, and so I'd like to keep that spirit alive, whether I’m at work, home or out running errands. Be a light wherever you go.”— Ila L., Alaska Customer Service Agent #AsianAmericanandPacificIslanderHeritageMonth https://t.co/X66qTNZS39

We love seeing our employees embrace their culture! Thank you for sharing this hula with us. And to our friends in Hawai’i, we miss you and can’t wait to see you again. #AsianAmericanandPacificIslanderHeritageMonth https://t.co/mTDQKbxL38

Congratulations, graduates! You give us hope for what’s next. Inspired by you, we’re offering a special discount to take a celebratory getaway later this summer. Book by midnight tonight (5/27) with code 2020GRADS for 20% off. Restrictions apply. Details: https://t.co/DwlJLo35Q8 https://t.co/NHq9kY7lNV

Our technicians fly above the rest! But don't just take our word for it––both Alaska and Horizon were awarded the prestigious Diamond Award by the FAA, 19 years in a row! data.text: Our cargo team always delivers! ✈️ Did you know––besides critical goods like mail and medical supplies––we also transport goods for small businesses, including fresh grown herbs from California and Hama Hama Oysters from Washington state? https://t.co/7hIVlcAlOD

"We’re still smiling!" says Alaska First Officer, Bill J. "I’m still getting used to wearing the mask while at the airport and around our guests. It’s different, but if it means getting back to normal sooner, then I’ll happily wear one and do my part!" https://t.co/ljcdFEbkra
The *space* between us is tough, Seattle. But we can’t wait to see our neighbors and hometown favorites on board again soon. ❤️ https://t.co/HBGzyNmZCf

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Last month, employees donated close to 40,000 kids’ snack packs to the San Francisco Mayor’s office for the purpose of feeding youth in-need during the COVID-19 global pandemic. https://t.co/KggWAbpnvi

“The need has been overwhelming, but we are humbled by the outpouring of support,” said Mayor Derek Kawakami of Kauai.  “Mahalo to Alaska Airlines for their generous donation of 14 pallets of food for the cause.”
Following the reduction of our flight schedule to the Hawaiian Islands, we donated over 26,000 pounds of food to help support several organizations across four islands. https://t.co/KivIWCdKO5

data.text: Employees delivered a total of 7,328 pounds of food across four small Alaskan communities, which included donated onboard items such as picnic packs, crackers, nuts, shelf-stable creamer and granola bars. https://t.co/yhiBpAK2Cb
